about.title: About Me
about.description: Tech Lead & Senior Software Engineer with expertise in building scalable applications
about.paragraph1: With over 6 years of experience in software development, I specialize in Laravel, React, and modern web architecture. I help teams modernize legacy systems, build scalable backends, and deliver fast, reliable PWAs. My expertise spans API design, database optimization, and performance tuning, with a strong focus on clean code and maintainability.
about.paragraph2: I've delivered projects across logistics, healthcare, travel, and e-commerce, often taking ownership from architecture to deployment. Passionate about helping agencies and product teams ship better software, faster. Currently leading technical teams and driving architectural decisions.
